mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT M.brand, p.prod_name FROM MEMBER M JOIN PROD P ON M.member_id = P.member_id JOIN RENT_PROD_STOCK RPS ON P.prod_id = RPS.prod_id JOIN RENT_DETAIL RD ON RPS.r_stock_id = RD.r_stock_id WHERE RD.RENTAL_CODE = #{rental_code}
SELECT rd.* FROM RENT_DETAIL rd JOIN RENT_PROD_STOCK rps ON rd.r_stock_id = rps.r_stock_id JOIN PROD p ON rps.prod_id = p.prod_id WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id}
